sources.title: He Who Gets Slapped 1924 Colorized
sources.description: Uniquely weird, compelling silent classic about a scientist who is discredited by a treacherous colleague and, humiliated, decides to join a circus as a clown. Excellent moving performance by Lon Chaney as the scientist/clown. Also stars John Gilbert and Norma Shearer. Colorized using DeOldify technology. No soundtrack. IMDB page: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0014972 (Note: Although this movie is public domain, the colorization is copyright by me. My colorized movies are freely uploaded for free personal use. Please don't put them on your own YouTube channel and monetize them. Thanks.)
